parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Tangent to Surface 1 = Normal to Surface 2 = Tapered to Vector 3 = Perpendicular to Vector 4 = Sweep

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: Distance at which to create the surface; valid for Tangent to Surface, Tapered to Vector, Perpendicular to Vector, and Sweep types only

parameters.name: FlipPullDir
parameters.description: True to flip the pull direction, false to not; valid for Normal to Surface and Tapered to Vector types only

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction, false to not; valid for Perpendicular to Vector type only

parameters.name: TrimAndSew
parameters.description: True to trim and knit the surface, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle for Tapered to Vector type only

parameters.name: CoordInput
parameters.description: True to enable coordinate input, false if not; for Sweep type only

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate

parameters.name: BConnectSurface
parameters.description: True to remove any connecting surfaces, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertRuledSurfaceFromEdge2
description: Inserts a ruled surface from the selected edge on this feature.
signature:

   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Double
Length
,
   System.Boolean
FlipPullDir

CoordInput

   System.Double
X
,

Y
,

Z
,
   System.Boolean
BConnectSurface
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Tangent to Surface 1 = Normal to Surface 2 = Tapered to Vector 3 = Perpendicular to Vector 4 = Sweep

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: Distance at which to create the surface; valid for Tangent to Surface, Tapered to Vector, Perpendicular to Vector, and Sweep types only

parameters.name: FlipPullDir
parameters.description: True to flip the pull direction, false to not; valid for Normal to Surface and Tapered to Vector types only

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True to flip the direction, false to not; valid for Perpendicular to Vector type only

parameters.name: TrimAndSew
parameters.description: True to trim and knit the surface, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle for Tapered to Vector type only

parameters.name: CoordInput
parameters.description: True to enable coordinate input, false if not; for Sweep type only

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate

parameters.name: BConnectSurface
parameters.description: True to remove any connecting surfaces, false to not

remarks:
If you
select
an edge with a selection mark of 4, the default face is used.
If you select an edge with a selection mark of 6, the alternate face is used.
